name: Nightmare Highway (Original Edition)
description:
Nightmare Highway for the Tandy Color Computer 1, 2, & 3

As you start your journey to CocoFEST, you notice the road ahead is littered with rogue furniture.

You realize you are driving on the NIGHTMARE HIGHWAY.

 In 2019, Terry Steen lived it. Now you get to simulate it in SG4 graphics.
